lead_paragraph: These cease-and-desist letters were sent to GNC, Target, Walgreens and Walmart by the New York State attorney general, who demanded that the retailers explain how they verify the ingredients in their herbal supplements.

headline.main: Retailers Are Warned Over Herbal Supplements

snippet: These cease-and-desist letters were sent to GNC, Target, Walgreens and Walmart by the New York State attorney general, who demanded that the retailers explain how they verify the ingredients in their herbal supplements.
